info.title: phpList API Documentation
info.description: This is the OpenAPI documentation for phpList API.

get.summary: Gets a list of all campaigns.
get.description: Returns a JSON list of all campaigns/messages.

get.summary: Gets a list of all subscriber lists.
get.description: Returns a JSON list of all subscriber lists.

requestBody.description: Pass parameters to create a new subscriber list.

get.description: Returns a single subscriber list with specified ID.

message.example: There is no list with that ID.

get.summary: Gets a list of all subscribers of a subscriber list.
get.description: Returns a JSON list of all subscribers for a subscriber list.

parameters.name: emails
parameters.description: emails of subscribers to delete from list.

get.summary: Gets the total number of subscribers of a list
get.description: Returns a count of all subscribers in a given list.

post.summary: Log in or create new session.
post.description: Given valid login data, this will generate a login token that will be valid for 1 hour.

delete.description: Delete the session passed as a parameter.

post.description: Creates a new subscriber (if there is no subscriber with the given email address yet).

get.summary: Gets a list of all templates.
get.description: Returns a JSON list of all templates.

post.description: Returns a JSON response of created template.

file.description: Optional file upload for HTML content

check_links.description: Check that all links have full URLs

check_images.description: Check that all images have full URLs

check_external_images.description: Check that all external images exist

message.example: No valid session key was provided as basic auth password.
Some fields invalid: email, confirmed, html_email
There is no entity with that ID.
